strategy_note: Video 1: Military #1 ranked theme (Marine variation - not repeating soldier). Video 2: EXPERIMENT - Medical alert dog saves life (untested theme, high potential).

videos.title: Marine Returns After 20 Months — His Dog's Reaction Left Everyone In Tears 😭 #shorts
videos.description: He deployed as a Marine and was gone for 20 months. No FaceTime. No visits. When he finally walked through that door, his dog proved that loyalty has no expiration date. #Marine #MilitaryDog #DogReunion #Heartwarming #shorts

scenes.prompt: Close-up: Golden retriever dog lying on a couch next to military boots and a folded uniform, staring sadly at front door, waiting, moody warm indoor lighting, cinematic emotional
scenes.caption: 20 months of waiting...

scenes.prompt: Wide shot: Front door of a suburban home, dog instantly alert, ears perked up, sensing something outside, golden afternoon light through windows, tension building cinematic
scenes.caption: He heard something

scenes.prompt: Medium shot: Marine in uniform opening front door, exhausted but smiling, dog exploding off couch toward him in pure joy, motion blur of excitement, cinematic slow motion
scenes.caption: MARINE IS HOME! 🎖️

scenes.prompt: Close-up: Dog frantically licking Marine's face while he kneels down and holds back tears, uniform still on, backpack on floor, raw emotional reunion, cinematic tears
scenes.caption: He never forgot 💙

scenes.prompt: Medium shot: Marine sitting on floor with dog in his lap, dog has paws on his chest, tail wagging so fast it's a blur, both overwhelmed, warm golden light, heartwarming cinematic
scenes.caption: 20 months... gone

scenes.prompt: Wide shot: Marine lying on living room floor with dog on top of him, wife watching from doorway wiping tears, peaceful beautiful family reunion moment, golden hour cinematic
scenes.caption: Dogs never forget ❤️

scenes.prompt: Close-up: Dog resting chin on Marine's shoulder, eyes closed in pure contentment, Marine hugging him gently, both at peace, soft warm cinematic portrait
scenes.caption: Finally home 😭

videos.title: Diabetic Alert Dog Wakes Owner At 3AM — The 911 Call Saved Her Life 😭 #shorts
videos.description: She was asleep when her dog started acting strange. At 3AM, he woke her up repeatedly and refused to stop. When paramedics arrived, they said she had minutes left. #DiabetesAlertDog #ServiceDog #MiracleDog #MedicalAlert #shorts

scenes.prompt: Close-up: Small black labrador wearing service dog vest lying alert at edge of woman's bed at night, watching her carefully, dark bedroom, only moonlight, concerned expression, cinematic
scenes.caption: 3:17 AM...

scenes.prompt: Medium shot: Dog urgently nudging and pawing at sleeping woman in bed, insistent, refusing to stop, escalating urgency, dim bedroom lighting, life-or-death tension cinematic
scenes.caption: He wouldn't stop

scenes.prompt: Medium shot: Woman waking up disoriented, confused, dog barking at her and then at phone on nightstand, emergency moment, dark bedroom tension, cinematic documentary style
scenes.caption: Sugar: 29mg/dL ☠️

scenes.prompt: Wide shot: Paramedics rushing through front door, woman sitting on floor with dog pressed against her, emergency lights flashing blue and red through windows, urgent dramatic cinematic
scenes.caption: Paramedics arrived

scenes.prompt: Close-up: Paramedic holding glucometer showing critical reading, looking at dog with disbelief, woman conscious and safe due to dog's alert, emergency room warm light, cinematic
scenes.caption: "Minutes left" they said

scenes.prompt: Medium shot: Woman sitting up in hospital bed, healthy and recovering, dog in service vest on the bed beside her, paw on her hand, relief and love, warm hospital light cinematic
scenes.caption: He saved my life 💙

scenes.prompt: Close-up: Woman crying happy tears while hugging her service dog, pressing face into his fur, pure gratitude, beautiful emotional moment, soft warm light, cinematic portrait
scenes.caption: Dogs are angels 😭
